```{r beech-sleep-drawer-setup, include = FALSE}
SDSdata::sds_setup()
library(etude)
library(learnr)
library(gradethis)
library(QandA)
library(ggformula)
library(mosaic)
library(mosaicCalc)
library(mosaicUSAFA)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
learnr::tutorial_options(exercise.timelimit = 60, 
                 exercise.checker = QandA::save_check_inputs)
```


`r etude::exercise_title()` The graphic below is about wind chill, temperature and wind speed. 

```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("images/wind-chill.png")
```




```{r beech-sleep-drawer-C1}
etude::true_or_false(
  "Interpreted as a contour plot, it shows wind chill as a function of temperature and wind speed.",
  TRUE
)
```
 

```{r beech-sleep-drawer-C2}
etude::true_or_false(
  "Interpreted as a series of slice plots it shows wind speed as a function of wind chill and temperature.",
  TRUE
)
```

```{r beech-sleep-drawer-C3}
etude::true_or_false(
  "For a wind speed of 15 and a temperature of 0, the wind chill is -10.",
  FALSE
)
```

```{r beech-sleep-drawer-C4}
etude::true_or_false(
  "For a wind speed of 30 and a temperature of 20, the wind chill is 0.",
  TRUE
)
```

```{r beech-sleep-drawer-C5}
etude::true_or_false(
  "For a wind *chill* of -40 and a temperature of -20, the wind *speed* is 10.",
  TRUE
)
```

```{r beech-sleep-drawer-C6}
etude::true_or_false(
  "For a wind speed of 20 and a wind chill of 0, the temperature is 0.",
  FALSE
)
```

```{r beech-sleep-drawer-C7}
etude::true_or_false(
  "For a wind speed of 15 and a temperature of 0, the wind chill is -10.",
  FALSE
)
```

```{r beech-sleep-drawer-C8}
etude::true_or_false(
  "For a temperature of 20 and a wind chill of 0, the wind speed is -30.",
  TRUE
)
```

```{r beech-sleep-drawer-C9}
etude::true_or_false(
  "For a wind speed of 10 and a wind chill of -70, the air temperature is -30.",
  FALSE
)
```
